column1: He  has  informed  the  Court  that  the  deceased  had  undergone  dialysis  during
treatment and has well explained to the Court  regarding  the injuries found in
the brain, the heart, the liver and the kidneys of the deceased. He has opined
that  the  internal  injuries  to  the  deceased  have  occurred  due  to  him  being
subjected to excessive physical exercise and has given detailed reasoning as to
